qcar.g4

Class SeenVertex

  • java.lang.Object
    • qcar.g4.SeenVertex
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    qcar.ISeenVertex

    public class SeenVertex
extends java.lang.Object
implements qcar.ISeenVertex
    Represents a seen vertex. Used by a Driver to make decisions.

                  QCarNature nature,

        Constructor of the class
        Parameters:
        vertexId - id of the vertex from the seen QCar
        nature - nature of the seen QCar
        offersBonus - defines if the seen vertex offers a bonus
        projectionLocation - point where the vertex is projected on the PhotoSensor
